uni.hamburg.yamms.model
Class Model

java.lang.Object
  uni.hamburg.yamms.model.Model
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicModel, CurrentModel
public abstract class Model
extends java.lang.Object

The micromagnetic model used. Represents the differential equation of motion by providing a method the calculates the derivative of the magnetization.

The most common implementation will calculate the right side of the Landau Lifshitz equation.

Author:
Claas Abert
